sentence.Network_en: More reactive are the heavier isotopes of hydrogen, deuterium and tritium.

sentence.Network_en: To produce deuterium requires an environment of high energy.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了产生氘,需要一个高能的环境.

sentence.Network_en: The rings are opened with hydrogen chloride and deuterium chloride.
sentence.Network_cn: 应用氯化氢和氯化氘打开沅环.
